activities.name: UpdateControlTable
activities.description: Stored procedure activity to store the new high-watermark value into external control table for delta data loading.

properties.description: Copy new or updated rows only from database using external control table

activities.name: LookupLastWaterMark
activities.description: Retrieve the last high-watermark value stored in external control table

activities.name: LookupCurrentWaterMark
activities.description: Retrieve  the current maximum value in watermark column of source data store

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DATEADD(dd,0,[ETL Last Run Start]) as NewWatermarkValue
FROM ca.Control_Table
WHERE [Group]=10 AND Entity='Model'

activities.name: DeltaCopyfromDB
activities.description: Copy activity to use query to filter the delta data by > last high-watermark and <= current high-watermark from source database, and then only copy the changes to the destination store.

	 and @{pipeline().parameters.Data_Source_WaterMarkColumn_modified} <= '@{activity('LookupCurrentWaterMark').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkValue}'

activities.name: UpdateWaterMark
activities.description: Stored procedure activity to store the new high-watermark value into external control table for delta data loading.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DATEADD(dd,-[DeltaOffset (Days)],[ETL Last Run End]) AS DeltaOffset
FROM ca.Control_Table
WHERE Entity='Model' AND
             [Group]=10

query.value:
select SQLUSer.POModel.ID
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.StandardCost
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.OrderExclusive
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.SerialTypeCode
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.ReceiveToLocation
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount1
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount2
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount3
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount4

      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount7
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount8
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount9
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount10
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount1Method
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount2Method
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount3Method
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount4Method
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount5Method
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount6Method
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount7Method
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount8Method
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount9Method
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount10Method
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount1Rate
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount2Rate
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount3Rate
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount4Rate
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount5Rate
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount6Rate
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount7Rate
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount8Rate
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount9Rate
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Discount10Rate
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Unreleased
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.RequestedDeliveryDate
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.ETADateMostUpdated
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.EDISentDate
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.EDISentTime
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.RSDMostUpdated
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.BackOrderInvoiceCode
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.BackOrderInvoiceDateStamp
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.BackOrderInvoiceLineTimeStamp
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.CostFactor
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Costed
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.DateReceived
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.DateStamp
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.ETADate
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.ExtendedFactoredCost
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.ExtendedUnitCost
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.LineTimeStamp
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.LocationCode
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.ModelCode
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Ordered
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.POCode
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.PackingSlipNumber
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.QtyOrdered
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.QtyPrevReceived
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.QtyReceived
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.QtySuggested
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.QuotedCost
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Received
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.Reference
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.SupplierInvoice
      ,SQLUSer.POModel.UnitCost
from 
SQLUser.POModel INNER JOIN SQLUser.PO ON
SQLUser.POModel.POCode=SQLUser.PO.Code
 where @{pipeline().parameters.Data_Source_WaterMarkColumn2} > '@{activity('LookupDeltaOffset').output.firstRow.DeltaOffset}'and @{pipeline().parameters.Data_Source_WaterMarkColumn2} <= '@{activity('LookupCurrentWaterMark').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkValue}'

      ,SQLUser.POSerial.Available

      ,SQLUser.POSerial.FloorPlan
      ,SQLUser.POSerial.FloorPlanDueDate

 where @{pipeline().parameters.Data_Source_WaterMarkColumn2} > '@{activity('LookupDeltaOffset').output.firstRow.DeltaOffset}'and @{pipeline().parameters.Data_Source_WaterMarkColumn2} <= '@{activity('LookupCurrentWaterMark').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkValue}'

query.value:
select ID
      ,AdditionalBillTo
      ,FloorPlanning
      ,ETADays
      ,BranchCode
      ,Memo
      ,BankAccount
      ,DefaultPONumber
      ,DefaultLocation
      ,Branch
      ,ImmediateReservedDays
      ,CreditGLAccount
      ,CRDueDateTerms
      ,CRDueDays
      ,EFTBankingInstitution
      ,EFTBranch
      ,EFTBankAccount
      ,EFTContactName
      ,EFTContactPhone
      ,EFTContactExtension
      ,EFTContactFax
      ,EFTEmail
      ,EDIFormat
      ,DefaultPOCost
      ,AvgLeadTime
      ,Obsolete
      ,DefaultCostCenter
      ,Require1099
      ,UseDueDateForSplitPayments
      ,AutoCreateAPInvoiceCosting
      ,EDIOutFolder
      ,DeliveryDateRequired
      ,UseRDDFrom
      ,AccountNumber
      ,Address1
      ,Address2
      ,BillToSupplierCode
      ,City
      ,Code
      ,Contact1
      ,Contact2
      ,CustomerServicePhone
      ,DateCreated
      ,DateModified
      ,Description
      ,DiscountDateTerms
      ,DiscountDays
      ,DiscountGLAccount
      ,DiscountPercentage
      ,DueDateTerms
      ,DueDays
      ,Email
      ,Fax
      ,Field1
      ,Field2
      ,Field3
      ,Field4
      ,Field5
      ,FreightGLAccount
      ,GSTCharged
      ,InventorySupplier
      ,LastYearPurchase
      ,Note
      ,NoteToPO
      ,POCostFactor
      ,POFloorPlanDays
      ,POLineType
      ,POMinOrder
      ,PONote
      ,POPrintISE
      ,POShipVia
      ,POUpdateAP
      ,Phone1
      ,Phone2
      ,PrevLastYearPurchase
      ,PrintAccountOnCheck
      ,PurchaseGLAccount
      ,State
      ,SupplierTypeCode
      ,TINNumber
      ,UserCreated
      ,UserModified
      ,Website
      ,YTDPurchase
      ,ZipCode
from 
@{pipeline().parameters.Data_Source_Table_Name} 
	 where (@{pipeline().parameters.Data_Source_WaterMarkColumn_modified} > '@{activity('LookupDeltaOffset').output.firstRow.DeltaOffset}' 
         OR SQLUser.Supplier.DateModified>'@{activity('LookupDeltaOffset').output.firstRow.DeltaOffset}')
	 and (@{pipeline().parameters.Data_Source_WaterMarkColumn_modified} <= '@{activity('LookupCurrentWaterMark').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkValue}'  OR
       SQLUser.Supplier.DateModified<='@{activity('LookupCurrentWaterMark').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkValue}')

activities.name: UpdateWaterMark
activities.description: Stored procedure activity to store the new high-watermark value into external control table for delta data loading.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DATEADD(dd,-[DeltaOffset (Days)],[ETL Last Run End]) AS DeltaOffset
FROM ca.Control_Table
WHERE Entity='Supplier' AND
             [Group]=10
